text: 17:11 Aisaia 34:16; Luk 16:29; Jon 5:39Berian Judaba, men araziba ko men nɨghnɨziba bar dera. Me Polɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baraghasa bar ifonge. Egha me Polɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨabar mɨngariba abɨgh bar dagh fofoghasa zurara Godɨn Akamɨn Osiziribar gari. Me kamaghɨn foghasa, Polɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, da guizɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, o? Kamaghɨn, me Tesalonikan itir Judabar arazibagh afira.
